Uses of Package
com.gwt.ss.client.loginable

Packages that use com.gwt.ss.client.loginable
com.gwt.ss.client.loginable   
com.gwt.ss.requestfactory.client.loginable $Id: package-info.java 175 2012-06-20 20:15:16Z steven.jardine@gmail.com $ 
 

Classes in com.gwt.ss.client.loginable used by com.gwt.ss.client.loginable
HasLoginHandler
          A interface interact with front user for processing login action, and add a LoginHandler to receive login result.
Important: when start Login}, no matter login succeeded or canceled, It must fire a LoginEvent to notify the waiting LoginableService.
LoginableAsync
          Interface for asynchronous remoteService descendants have chance to be wrapped as a LoginableService.
example see blow:
非同步remoteService繼承此 Interface時，可被包裝成LoginableService
範例如下：

@RemoteServiceRelativePath("stockPrices")
public interface StockPriceService extends RemoteService {
  StockPrice[] getPrices(String[] symbols);
}

public interface StockPriceServiceAsync extends LoginableAsync{
  void getPrices(String[] symbols, AsyncCallback callback);
}

public class StockWatcher implements EntryPoint {
  public void onModuleLoad() {
    StockPriceServiceAsync stockPriceSvc = GWT.create(StockPriceService.class);
    StockPriceServiceAsync stockPriceSvcProxy = GWT.create(StockPriceServiceAsync.class);
    LoginableService loginService = (LoginableService) stockPriceSvcProxy;

  /*If not setRemoteService, proxy auto gerenate remote service by calling GWT.create(StockPriceServiceAsync.class)
      若是未設定setRemoteService，proxy 會自動叫用GWT.create(StockPriceServiceAsync.class) 產生一個*/
  loginService.setRemoteService(stockPriceSvc);

    /*setting HasLoginHandler with a customed login dialog implements HasLoginHandler
      設定自定的登錄畫面(必須實做HasLoginHandler)*/
    loginService.setHasLoginHandler(yourCustomedLoginDialog);

    /*Now call RPC from proxy wrapper stockPriceSvcProxy
      現在改用包裝後的stockPriceSvcProxy進行遠端呼叫*/
    stockPriceSvcProxy.getPrices(symbols,new AsyncCallback() {
      @Override
      public void onSuccess(StockPrice[] result) {
        ...
      }
/*You must handle GwtAccessDeniedException: Whenever user has not enough authority LoginCancelException: User cancel login when login dialog box display 		Other exception 您必須自行處理以下錯誤: GwtAccessDeniedException: 用戶權限不足時 LoginCancelException: 登錄畫面出現時，用戶取消登錄 與其它所有錯誤 */
      @Override
      public void onFailure(Throwable caught) {
        ...
LoginEvent
          Represents login process result.
表示登錄的最後結果
LoginHandler
          Handler interface for LoginEvent events.
You may not require this handler.
 

Classes in com.gwt.ss.client.loginable used by com.gwt.ss.requestfactory.client.loginable
HasLoginHandler
          A interface interact with front user for processing login action, and add a LoginHandler to receive login result.
Important: when start Login}, no matter login succeeded or canceled, It must fire a LoginEvent to notify the waiting LoginableService.
